relation: Complete the first mission, "The Cousins Bellic".
Unlock the ability to ride one of Roman Bellic's taxis by raising his "Like" statistic to 60% or more.
Unlock the ability to purchase guns from Little Jacob by raising his "Like" statistic to 75% or more.
Unlock the ability to ride Brucie Kibbutz's helicopter by raising his "Like" statistic to 75% or more.
Unlock the ability to acquire bombs from Patrick McReary by raising his "Like" statistic to 75% or more.
Score 180 points with three darts (three triple 20s) in a darts game.
Win a game of pool against a friend.
Score a turkey (3 strikes in a row) in a game of bowling.
Deliver all 30 cars requested by Stevie.
Use a police computer in a police car to "View Current Crimes" and capture (kill) 20 criminals.
Use a police computer in a police car to "View Most Wanted" and complete all 30 Most Wanted missions.
Complete 10 melee counters within 4 minutes or less.
Do a wheelie on a motorcycle for at least 500 feet.
Roll your car 5 times in one crash.
Destroy 10 vehicles in 10 seconds or less.
Achieve first place in 20 (single-player) races (given by Brucie Kibbutz).
Without skipping from one island to the next, complete an entire taxi ride.
Take each of Liberty City's five helicopter tours.
Have a successful date with a girlfriend to get invited into her house.
Fly a helicopter under all 15 major bridges.
In Multiplayer, kill at least 5 players that are not on your team.
Earn a rank promotion in Multiplayer.
Achieve first place in a ranked Multiplayer race with damage enabled, but minimal damage to your vehicle.
Complete Deal Breaker in under 7 minutes 4 seconds, Hangman's Noose in under 2 minutes 32 seconds, and Bomb Da Base II in under 5 minutes 56 seconds.
Have your team win in all ranked Multiplayer games.
Achieve first place in 20 different ranked Multiplayer races.
Play as both sides, and win as each one, in all ranked Multiplayer variations, races, and also Cops 'n Crooks.
In a ranked Multiplayer deathmatch, kill 20 players with a Pistol.
In a ranked Multiplayer match, kill a Rockstar Developer or a person linked to one such killing.
Maintain a 6-star Wanted Level for 5 minutes without getting Busted or Wasted.
Meet all available friends and attain a 90% "Like" statistic with all that are still alive.
Complete the final mission, "Out of Commission" or "A Revenger's Tragedy".
Achieve the highest rank possible in Multiplayer.
Complete all Storyline Missions in less than 30 gameplay hours.
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Achievements in GTA IV" - Grand Theft Wiki, the GTA wiki
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {4980=There are 50 Achievements in the Xbox 360 and PC versions and 51 Trophies in the PlayStation 3 version of Grand Theft Auto IV. While Xbox 360 achievements were available from the beginning, to obtain trophies on the PS3 the player must have at least version 2.41 of the PS3 firmware and version 1.03 of GTA IV. Saved games from before these updates will not support trophies, so the game must be restarted. Some achievements/trophies are blocked by the use of cheats. The Xbox 360 and PC achievements are worth a total of 1000 Gamerscore points. On the PC, achievements are tracked through the Games For Windows Live! system. Since Games For Windows Live! is essentially the Windows equivalent of Xbox Live!, the achievements are identical and work in exactly the same way on both systems. More achievements are added with The Lost and Damned downloadable content.}
textBeforeTable: There are 50 Achievements in the Xbox 360 and PC versions and 51 Trophies in the PlayStation 3 version of Grand Theft Auto IV. While Xbox 360 achievements were available from the beginning, to obtain trophies on the PS3 the player must have at least version 2.41 of the PS3 firmware and version 1.03 of GTA IV. Saved games from before these updates will not support trophies, so the game must be restarted. Some achievements/trophies are blocked by the use of cheats. The Xbox 360 and PC achievements are worth a total of 1000 Gamerscore points. On the PC, achievements are tracked through the Games For Windows Live! system. Since Games For Windows Live! is essentially the Windows equivalent of Xbox Live!, the achievements are identical and work in exactly the same way on both systems. More achievements are added with The Lost and Damned downloadable content. Revision as of 14:05, 24 August 2009 !Achievement Name   !Achievement Name   {|class="wikitable" style="vertical-align:top;" valign="top"   {|class="wikitable" style="vertical-align:top;" valign="top"   , and hence availible only on Xbox360. The following achievements are exclusive
textAfterTable: For tips on how to get some of these Achievements/Trophies, go to the Trophies/Achievements section of GTA IV Tips. The Lost and Damned The following achievements are exclusive to the first DLC episode The Lost and Damned for Grand Theft Auto IV, and hence availible only on Xbox360. Achievement Name Achievement Points Requirement Full Chat 70 Build Terry and Clay’s toughness to 100% through missions and gang wars activities. The Lost Boy 25 Complete "This Shit's Cursed". Get Good Wood 50 Knock 69 bikers off their rides during races with the bat. One Percenter 5 Complete "Clean and Serene". Easy Rider 100 Complete "Get Lost".
